SqlOperation.Name: GetAllReferentialValues
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT `Id`, `WorkspaceId`, `Name`, `Type`, `Status` FROM `clstr_clusters` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId ORDER BY `Name` ASC;

SqlOperation.Name: GetExtendedById
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT c.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName FROM `clstr_clusters` c INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON c.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE c.`WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND c.`Id` = @Id;

SqlOperation.Name: GetExtendedByName
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT c.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName FROM `clstr_clusters` c INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON c.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE c.`WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND c.`Name` = @Name;

SqlOperation.Name: CountAll
